name: Down Whale
description:
Down Whale was made in 72 hours for the 2021 Ludum Dare Game Jam by:

  • Janet Lin - Artist
  • Mehul Sahai - Artist
  • Allie Irwin - Artist
  • Enrique Romero - Artist
  • Ryan Woods - Design / Scripting
  • Daniel Onstott - Design / Scripting
  • PJ Rivas - Design / Scripting
  • Ben Sheh - Audio
You are a spacefarer in a particularly dangerous line of work...

--mining for the valuable crystals found within the husks of dead celestial creatures.

Your ship is affixed with a large drill capable of digging deep into these celestial creatures to find the bounties within.

The deeper you descend, the more valuable your rewards-- but the greater the danger!

Defend your drill, scour the caves of the Celestial, and find your fortune in Down Whale!
